product_name: Lole Vinyasa Capri Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Subtle and stylish, the Lole Vinyasa capris provide exceptional comfort for yoga practice, Pilates or your other workouts. Fabric blend provides light support, moisture-wicking performance, odor resistance and ample stretch. Cotton content of fabric is organic. Hidden pocket at waistband stores small items. Lined gusset; reflective logo. The Lole Vinyasa capris feature flatlock seams to reduce chafing. Closeout.
short_description: Subtle and stylish, the Lole Vinyasa capris provide exceptional comfort for yoga practice, Pilates or your other workouts.
